channel.title: Indiana on MicroModa
channel.description: Recent content in Indiana on MicroModa

item.title: Anderson University
item.description: Anderson University is a private Christian university in Anderson, Indiana, offering 65 undergraduate majors and graduate degrees in business, music, nursing, and theology. Anderson University is ranked among the best colleges in the Midwest.

item.title: Ball State University
item.description: The official website of Ball State, an accredited, state-assisted university in Muncie, Indiana. About 21,000 undergraduate and graduate students enroll each year in diverse academic programs on and off campus.

item.title: Calumet College of Saint Joseph
item.description: Calumet College of St. Joseph (CCSJ) is a small, family-oriented, four-year college offering master’s, bachelor’s, and associate’s degrees as well as certificate programs. CCSJ has no out-of-state tuition differential and offers 18 athletics programs.

item.title: DePauw University
item.description: Nationally recognized, DePauw provides a set of exceptional college experiences marked by intellectual rigor and shaped by a dynamic faculty. These experiences are further enhanced by an engaging residential campus community and a breadth and depth of perspectives inside and outside of the classroom. For nearly 175 years, a DePauw education has provided students with a solid foundation for a lifetime of living and learning and helped our graduates achieve uncommon success in a wide variety of fields around the nation and the world.

item.title: Franklin College
item.description: Residential four-year institution, 20 minutes south of downtown Indianapolis. Approximately 1,000 students 55 majors, 41 minors and 11 pre-professional programs.

item.title: Grace College and Theological Seminary
item.description: Grace College is a four-year Christian Liberal Arts college located in Winona Lake, IN. Grace College and Seminary is an evangelical Christian community of higher education which applies biblical values in strengthening character, sharpening competence, and preparing for service.

item.title: Harrison College-Indianapolis
item.description: Learn more about the programs and courses offered at a Harrison College campus near you.

item.title: Indiana Institute of Technology
item.description: Indiana Tech offers career-oriented degree programs in engineering, business, computer science, criminal justice, education, and more for learners at one of our campuses or online.
